system.description: An immobile, blazing curtain of shimmering violet fire appears. One side of the wall, selected by you, sends forth waves of heat dealing 2d4 fire damage to creatures within 10 feet and 1d4 fire damage to those 11 to 20 feet away. Creatures passing through the wall take 2d6 fire damage +1 per caster level (max +20).
system.target: Opaque sheet of flame up to 20 ft. long/level or a ring of fire with radius 5 ft./level
